pullRequest.title: Changed List return type to ImmutableList in Wikidata schema package classes

nodes.bodyText: Any chance of convincing your IDE to not reorder imports? It makes for a very noisy diff.

commit.message: added test cases to check unmodifiable Lists

nodes.bodyText: This will only test if expr.getNameDescs() is immutable, since that will already throw an exception. The second line will not be executed if the first line throws an exception. So you need to split that into two tests.
